verses.name: 2 Samuel 22:40
verses.text: For thou hast girded me with strength to battle: them that rose up against me hast thou subdued under me.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 22:41
verses.text: Thou hast also given me the necks of mine enemies, that I might destroy them that hate me.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 22:42
verses.text: They looked, but there was none to save; even unto the Lord, but he answered them not.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 22:43
verses.text: Then did I beat them as small as the dust of the earth, I did stamp them as the mire of the street, and did spread them abroad.
